description:
Microsoft Word is considered the best word processing program out in the market. Learning Microsoft is easy.

    Why learn Word? Consider the following:
  • It is user-friendly:
    • Microsoft Word is the most user-friendly word processing program. The icons on top are easy to locate and understand. Everything a newbie needs is located on the standard toolbar.
  • Compatibility:
    • If you use Microsoft Office in your work, you should learn to master Microsoft Word. You can import almost any files on Word, even reports from Microsoft Excel or some graphic files from Powerpoint or Publisher. Word is also the easiest to learn among the program in Microsoft Office
  • It is everywhere:
    • Microsoft Word is everywhere. Most public computer caf√©s have it, most offices are using it, and most people prefer it. If you are not using it, sharing your documents will be difficult. Aside from that, most word processing programs can read the Word format, but they cannot create one. So, if you want to save time and share your documents fast, choose Microsoft Word.

    If you are interested in becoming a secretary, pass MS Word 2013 Expert Cert or to gain general knowledge on Word 2013, then this course if for you! You learn the following:

  • document protection

  • Macros

  • page set-ups

  • backward compatibility

  • different file types

  • print options
    •


    and many more! This course is less than an hour recorded in HD. This course is structured into five sections with 19 lessons.

    The outline of this course is the same exact outline of the certificate.
title: Become Microsoft Word  Certified Expert and Earn 40k
